main.name: Oliver  Mensah
main.description: He currently develops  Mobile apps(Android), Desktop, Web Applications as well as Web services and APIs. If he is not working on a software project, he is either writing technical articles, reading on software architecture and design or actively involved in building the tech ecosystem in Ghana.  He lives by the mantra; 'The best way to solidify your understanding of what you learn is by teaching it to others',
main.bio: Oliver now writes software at Agro Innova as a National Service Personnel. He is passionate about the people and technical aspect of the software industry. By 'people' he meant the developer community and by 'technical' he meant the whole design and implementation of technical decisions of software application.

education.description: Ashesi's Computer Science programme focuses not only on software design and programming, but also on empowering young people to be at the forefront of African growth by harnessing the power of technology.

work.title: National Service Personnel, Software Developer
work.description: Writing Software that improves the agricultural space in Ghana. During my work at Agro Innova, I had developed a mobile application that was geared towards data collection of poultry farmers in Ghana. This project was in partnership between Agro Innova and Ghana National Association of Poultry Farmers.

work.title: Guest Author
work.description: Writes tutorials on how to use software technologies to a wide audience.

work.title: Facebook Developer Circle Accra, Co-Lead
work.description: Developer Circles is a community-driven program that's free to join and open to coders, programmers, Software Developers, students, etc. Each Developer Circle is led by members of the local community who act as leads for the circle, organizing events offline and managing a local online Facebook community.  Developer Circles are forums to share knowledge, collaborate, build new ideas, and learn about the latest technologies from Facebook and other industry leaders.  As a Co-Lead,  he coordinates with Facebook on promoting the ecosystem of technology in Ghana, organize technology events like Meetups, Hackathons, train other developers on Facebook Technologies like React, React Native, etc

projects.title: The barePHP Framework
projects.description: A mirocframework for building web application with PHP. barePHP focuses on MVC architectural pattern, design patterns like Registry to provide beginner friendly minimal approach to building PHP web application.

projects.title: SyncCases
projects.description: This was my class project. It was supposed to be completed in two so it has a lot more work to be done on it. SyncCases is an app that allows you users to be vigilante on our roads . Users report road users who do not adhere to rules on our roads. Users capture and report culprits to authorities and let the authorities handle the rest
